title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 99: Featuring Pat Maroon
description:
On this week's episode, the guys are joined by Pat Maroon, who recently signed with his home town St. Louis Blues. Pat tells some of the back stories about how the deal came to be, some of the factors that went into him signing a one-year deal, how excited his son was and much more. The guys also recap Whit's golf trip across the pond and Biz & Grinnelli's trip to British Columbia. The guys wrapped up with the horrible news about the passing of Ray Emery and some NHL news.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
